turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi! How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Great! How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm good. So, do you like charity?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Charity, as in the act of donating? Or Charity, the woman who lives nearby?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Charity, as in the act of donating. I\'m thinking about an international non-governmental organization called "Save the Children". It\'s really sweet!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh, yes! I run a couple of annual events for charity. Save the Children sounds like a good name. What do they do, where and how long have they been around?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They contribute to children's rights to health, education, and safety. They focus in places where children are often neglected, like third-world countries, or inner-cities which are overpopulated. They've been around a long time from what I know, at least the past ten years. I recently just started donating to them.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's pretty great. I grew up in the inner city. There were some rough times, for sure. How often do you donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I donate monthly, just a small donation of $5, and if you'd like to, you can donate through this chat right now! You can donate any portion of your payment from $.01 to $2! Think of it like all of these mTurk surveys. Just a cent. Eventually they add up! You can donate any portion of your payment for this task or HIT or whatever you'd call it! Think of it as your quick little helping hand.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sounds easy. Are they a 501c3? Can you give me a website for more info?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes they are! Here is the website -  URL  It truly is a great organization.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh wow. great site with great information. They look like they're doing great work. I especially like that 86% of their money goes to help!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's always nice knowing a charity is actually doing something! So would you like to donate to this charity via this chat? Every little bit counts!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: sure! how would I begin?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You can choose any bit of your payment for taking this HIT or task, so anywhere from $0.01 to $2 (your max payment) and send it in a lone message through this chat. The research team will filter out your donation and subtract it from the funds! It's that easy!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do I already know how much they're paying? Should I say it in percentile or actual dollar amount?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You would use actual dollar amount in this case. For example, I would send in the next message { I would like to donate $2 towards Save the Children!}.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: and, final question, how do I know they actually receive it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team has guaranteed me that they are working in conjunction with Save the Children. I can personally guarantee you that your donation is going straight to a child in need.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to donate $1.72 towards Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you so much! Your donation is so important to the lives of children everywhere.
